name: Moon Mamba
description:
How long can your Moon Mamba survive, trapped in a laser-cage space prison on the surface of a desolate moon?

Use simple gestures to urge him around his tiny lunar realm in a fast and frantic, unique, and truly 3D twist on the classic 'snake' game.

Your Moon Mamba loves to eat nearby satellites and they make him grow longer, but it's game over if he bites himself!
